snippet: In advance of Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel’s visit, Israeli officials warned that Israel was prepared and able to carry out a strike on Iran’s nuclear facilities by itself.
abstract: Israeli defense and military officials, in advance of Defense Sec Chuck Hagel’s visit, warn Israel is prepared and able to carry out lone military strike against Iran’s nuclear facilities; Israeli officials have been growing frustrated with failure of international efforts to halt what Israel and the West see as an Iranian quest for nuclear weapons.
lead_paragraph: In advance of Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel’s visit, Israeli officials warned that Israel was prepared and able to carry out a strike on Iran’s nuclear facilities by itself.

headline.seo: Israeli Officials Stress Readiness for Lone Strike on Iran
headline.main: Officials in Israel Stress Readiness for a Lone Strike on Iran
headline.print_headline: Officials in Israel Stress Readiness for a Lone Strike on Iran
